snippet: The books on our shelves continue to speak to us, unlike ephemeral e-books.
abstract: Editorial reflects on the different experiences of reading a physical book and reading an e-book; posits that physical books seem to stick in one's memory better.
lead_paragraph: The books on our shelves continue to speak to us, unlike ephemeral e-books.

headline.main: Books to Have and to Hold
headline.print_headline: Books to Have and to Hold
